attribute.name: accept
attribute.description: HTML: Provides a comma-separated list of content types that the server processing this form can handle.

attribute.name: acceptcharset
attribute.description: HTML: The list of character encodings accepted by the server for this form.

attribute.name: enctype
attribute.description: HTML: The content type used to submit this form to the server.

attribute.name: onreset
attribute.description: HTML: Script to be invoked when this form is reset.

attribute.name: onsubmit
attribute.description: HTML: Script to be invoked when this form is submitted.
